EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 3 Strength. NL Gain 3 Artifact.

${modID}:ParadisChateaudIf.NAME: Paradis Chateau d'If
${modID}:ParadisChateaudIf.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the enemy's fgo:Combust !M! times. NL The enemy fgo:Stunned this turn.
${modID}:ParadisChateaudIf.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the enemy's fgo:Combust +1 !M! times. NL The enemy fgo:Stunned this turn.

${modID}:SecondLife.NAME: Anpu Neb Ta Djeser
${modID}:SecondLife.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand and Upgrade it.
${modID}:SecondLife.FLAVOR: This card has no effect when upgraded.

${modID}:YewBow.NAME: Yew Bow
${modID}:YewBow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Poison, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:Unlimited.NAME: Unlimited Blade Works
${modID}:Unlimited.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add !M! random Attack into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

${modID}:SuitenNikko.NAME: Suiten Nikko Amaterasu Yano Shiraishi
${modID}:SuitenNikko.DESCRIPTION: All cards in your hand cost 1 less this turn. NL Gain !M!% fgo:NP.
